content: c2c beanie hat by carolyn calderon a beautiful crochet hat made in basic crochet stitches and is a fast make with knowledge of corner to corner technique the result is a very textured mesmerizing detailed hat looks great in a solid or variegated yarn any #4 weight medium yarn can be used and a size 5 00 mm h/8 crochet hook this sample is in lion brand heartland yarn includes written instructions and video on the stitch in us terminology please see pattern website for more details thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
